price: Hakika vinyama viovu mbele ya Mwenyezi Mungu ni vile viziwi na bubu visio tumia akili zao.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلۡبُكۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: Hao washirikina na wanaafiki ni kama wanyama waovu kabisa walio sibiwa na uziwi, kwa hivyo hawasikii; na wakasibiwa na ububu, kwa hivyo hawasemi. Basi wao ni viziwi kwa Haki, na hivyo hawasikii, wala hawaitamki na hawaielewi!!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna sharra al-dawābi ʿinda al-lahi al-ṣumu al-buk'mu alladhīna lā yaʿqilūna
